epd_metadata.title: Declaración Ambiental de Producto
epd_metadata.disclaimer: EPDs belonging to the same product category but registered by different programs may not be comparable. EPDs of construction products may not be comparable if they do not comply with EN 15804.

product_description.organization_description: HOLCIM ESPANA is a global leader in construction materials and solutions with activities in cement, aggregates, concrete solutions, and construction products. The company aims to reduce carbon emissions and promote sustainable, high-quality construction materials and solutions.
product_description.product_scope: This EPD covers all concrete produced at the above-mentioned production sites.
product_description.product_name: Hormigones H25 (Estándar, Agilia y Artevia), Hormigones H30 (Estándar, Agilia y Artevia), Hormigones H35 (Estándar y Agilia)
product_description.product_code: UN CPC 375 - Manufactures of concrete, cement and plaster
product_description.product_identification: HOLCIM ESPANA is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-quality concrete, with projects in roads, networks, and collective housing. The concrete is premixed and must be transported and used quickly in local markets under optimal conditions. The product includes structural concretes and Artevia for continuous pavements.

lca_information.declared_unit: 1 m3 of premixed concrete with strength of 25 MPa, 30 MPa or 35 MPa meeting technical construction requirements with a reference service life of 100 years
lca_information.temporal_representativeness: Factory data from 2019; residual electricity mix from Spain 2018
lca_information.system_boundary: Cradle to grave including modules A, B, C and D
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum 95% of total inputs (mass and energy) per module included; more than 99% of inputs accounted for
excluded_processes: Environmental impact of infrastructure, construction, production equipment and tools not directly consumed
Impacts related to personnel transport to/from work

installation.transfer_method: Product transferred directly from truck to construction site

waste_treatment.waste_collection: Product collected mixed with other construction waste

end_of_life.module_D: Includes benefits from reuse, recovery and recycling; recycled product considered as avoided product (crushed gravel)

co2_uptake_by_carbonation.formula: CO2 uptake = k * sqrt(t) + Utcc * C * Dc / 1000

parameters.Utcc: Maximum theoretical absorption in g CO2/kg cement
parameters.assumption: Only one face of 1 m3 concrete is in contact with air

biogenic_carbon_content.note: 1 kg biogenic carbon equals 44/12 kg CO2

recycled_materials_handling.post_consumer_content: 0% for cement, gravel, water, and additives in all product variants
recycled_materials_handling.renewable_material_content: 0% cement, 100% gravel, approx. 6.5-6.6% water by weight
recycled_materials_handling.water_recycling: Product contains significant amount of recycled water from rainwater and truck cleaning

environmental_commitments.carbon_footprint_registration: Registered carbon footprint and emission reduction commitments for 2016-2019 with Spanish Ministry for Ecological Transition
environmental_commitments.scope_of_calculation: Cement, concrete and mortar manufacturing activities in Spain including central offices and 63 production centers
environmental_commitments.circular_economy_commitment: Focus on maximizing waste lifecycle through reuse and recycling; Geocycle subsidiary pre-treats waste for alternative fuels in clinker production
environmental_commitments.quarry_restoration: Over 30 years of proactive quarry restoration to generate net positive biodiversity impact; recognized with European Business Awards for the Environment 2018
